metadata.title: CVE-2016-9439 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Tatsuya Kinoshita w3m fork before 0.5.3-31.Infinite recursion vulnerability in w3m allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9439` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

w3m - 0.5.3-26ubuntu0.1
w3m-img - 0.5.3-26ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: w3m package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5.3-26ubuntu0.1').
